name: recessionary
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or caused by an economic recession (= a period when the economy of a country is not successful): The government is desperate to avoid a recessionary spiral. The big concern was the effect of recessionary job losses.
More examplesFewer examplesRecessionary fears were affecting technology companies.A recessionary wave has started to move across Europe.Only larger organizations will have the financial resources to ride out recessionary periods.Manufacturing companies are operating at levels that are close to recessionary.
